errorDesc.TEAM_REDUNDANT_STARTERS: Each position can have only one starter
errorDesc.PLAYER_EXCEED_SHOT_ALLOC: Shot allocation per player must be less than MAX_PLAYER_SHOT_ALLOC_PCT
errorDesc.PLAYER_EXCEED_TIME_ALLOC: Shot allocation per player must be less than their play time percentage
errorDesc.TEAM_LESS_THAN_MIN_ROSTER: Number of players per team must be more than MIN_PLAYERS_ON_ROSTER
errorDesc.TEAM_MORE_THAN_MAX_ROSTER: Number of players per team must be less than MAX_PLAYERS_ON_ROSTER
errorDesc.TEAM_POS_TIME_ALLOC_INVALID: Players of the same position must have play time add up to 48 minutes
errorDesc.TEAM_NOT_ENOUGH_STARTERS: Starter in each position must be playable
errorDesc.TEAM_INSUFFICIENT_SHOT_ALLOC: Total shot & shot3Point allocations must sum up to 100%
